gradecomputor

Class computorMainWindow

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • java.awt.Window
          • java.awt.Frame
            • javax.swing.JFrame
              • org.jfree.chart.ui.ApplicationFrame
                • gradecomputor.computorMainWindow
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.WindowListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.util.EventListener, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants

    public class computorMainWindow
extends org.jfree.chart.ui.ApplicationFrame
    This Class is responsible for the display of the student lineup and relevant information for the judgment of their grades. The judgment encapsulates the state of information and the action performed to determine the academic standing of students. This includes:
    • The ordered final score of students
    • The appropriate Markers indicating the levelups
    • The clustering of students based on their grade
    • The global data concerning the mean, median and standard deviation

    TODO: Write a new Renderer for student bars with the Highlight and Canvas information display feature.

    Since:
    0.10
    Version:
    %I%, %G%
    Author:
    quarkCowboy
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • computorMainWindow

        public computorMainWindow(java.lang.String studentWTitle,
                          java.lang.String chartTitle)
        The method generates the barchart corresponding to the Student score and adds the menu and status bar with the plot. It initializes a series of mouse listeners for interactive data handling. Finally it generates the appropriate menubar.
        Parameters:
        studentWTitle - String variable to appear as the title of application Window
        chartTitle - String variable for the title of the bar chart
        Since:
        version 0.10
